name: Dietary Order Acknowledgment
description: Response message acknowledging receipt and status of dietary orders from food service systems
businessPurpose: Acknowledge dietary order receipt and communicate order status changes back to the ordering system
timing: Sent by food service system in response to dietary order messages (O03)
realWorldScenarios: Kitchen confirms diabetic diet order received and scheduled
Food service acknowledges texture-modified diet for dysphagia patient
Dietary department confirms NPO order and suspends meal delivery
Kitchen reports inability to fulfill kosher meal request - substitution offered
Food service acknowledges allergy alert and implements dairy-free protocols
Dietary system confirms order cancellation for discharged patient

generationRules.MSA.2: Original message control ID from dietary order
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - dietary acknowledgment affects meal planning and patient nutrition
